Title: Technoscrying: Dragonskull Island
Description:
I tuned my various sensors for Dracthyr relics, and they've triangulated a new location for us to investigate off the eastern coast of the Forbidden Reach.

The local Drakonid tell me it's named Dragonskull Island. Ominous, no?  You're not easily frightened, are you?
ObjectivesText: Meet Zenata at Dragonskull Cave in Forbidden Reach.
